participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and caring, with a strong passion for helping others.
participant_1.background: i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. my daughter is a child prodigy.

participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i love new kids on the block.
